column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Had a salad to begin.  As the waiter said
column2: it has the "Bentley of bacon" on top.  He was not kidding.  That has to be the best bacon I've had in my life.  Words can't describe it.  I ordered the bone-in
column3: dry aged rib eye.  My gf had the petite fillet.  Both were fantastic.  However
column4: I should have gone with my standard of either side of the t-bone.  I'm more of a fillet or New York guy.
